name: Spear of savannah
description:
Protect the savannah from poachers with the multi-function magical spear.
This magic spear can stab , fire energy bolts, and generate an energy shield to block shots from poachers hunting rifle.

Supported platforms:

  • Oculus Quest: install with an APK installer (SideQuest). Remember to enable developer options.
  • Oculus Rift S: unpack the zip file and start the executable "Spear of savannah.exe"

Made with Unity XR Interaction Toolkit. We are not sure if it works with Vive headsets.

"Spear of savannah" made by
Alejandro Iñigo Rojas (art director)
Lei Ye (game mechanics)

For "VR-Jam 2020" on itch.io
